data.title: Mark Valley Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Mark Valley with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Before pursuing a career in acting, he spent five years in the Army and served in Operation Desert Storm

Discovered by an agent while stationed in Germany

In 1994, he took over the popular role of Jack Deveraux on the daytime soap opera Days of Our Lives

After portraying an FBI Agent on the first season of the Fox series Fringe, he was cast as security specialist Christopher Chance on the Fox action series Human Target

Has been an avid skydiver

Awards

2007Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series: nominated

2006Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series: nominated

2005Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Comedy Series: nominated
